name: Moving Pixtures App.
blurb: Super SCREEN SAVER for iPad/iPhone that can use your photos to create a USER customizable Animation on your device.

rewards.reward: Your NAME will go onto the MOVINGPIXTURES.COM website as a backer forever! (or as long as I still have the website and product alive - hopefully forever)\r\nRemember you can also be a backer by simply buying the $1 app on the Apple App store. Thanks for that, if that's how you  choose to help!
Digital copy of a photograph from my Art Website.\r\nLimited resolution copies (of 1024pixels on widest side). Can be used as backgrounds on your devices/computer.
Pre-Release MovingPixtures app. - made available 1 week before public gets the App. All backers will be sent a PROMO code via E-Mail.

1 MovingPixtures VIDEO made for YOU. 
I will create a personalized MovingPixtures Based YouTube video for you, based on direction/details ( and possibly photos) that you provide. 1 delivered per week to pledger selected by "coin toss" every week. ["coin toss" will be a fair random selection - documented on MovingPixtures Website]
NOTE: all pledgers will get the Reward - the randomness is just in WHEN you get it delivered.
Delivery is via YouTube unless otherwise agreed upon.
(52 weeks = 52 available)

1 TEAM-SHOT custom MovingPixtures  VIDEO for your entire team to enjoy, uploaded to YouTube, based on direction/details ( and possibly photos) that you provide. 1 delivered per week to one of the pledgers, selected by "coin toss" every week. ["coin toss" will be a fair random selection - documented on MovingPixtures Website]\r\nNOTE: all pledgers will get the Reward - the randomness is just in WHEN you get it delivered.\r\nSee Movingpixtures.com for sample of what this might look like - search on "Team Sample". Delivery starts April 2014 and continues once a week for as long as it takes.( 52 weeks = 52 available)

A signed/numbered LIMITED EDITION PRINT (16"X20") of any of my photographs which exist on my art Website - www.gindli.com. (Based on availability within each edition - the availability will be documented on the www.MovingPixtures.com Website.)\r\n20 prints x 100 available = 2000 Qty.
Original Art : "Shoreline Campfire" 5"x7" Acrylic on Canvas. (Includes Frame - Professionally Framed) (special price is set for Kickstarter campaign)

11 of YOUR PICTURES in the APP. for 1 MONTH. This means 11 of your pictures will appear in the MovingPixtures App. as a subset of the defaults (non-exclusively) for a duration of at least 1 month. This means your pictures will become some of the default pictures that ship with MovingPixtures App. Pictures must agree with the apps. 4+ age rating. All rights to pictures remain with owner - copyright notice will appear in app. protecting all pictures.  Each picture will also be listed on the MovingPixtures.com Website with a thumbnail and artist contact information for the same duration of time (if desired).

Original Art : "Shore Gull String Art" 
16"x20" Acrylic on Canvas.
(special price is set for Kickstarter campaign)
This was an experimental piece, which started by placing a string on a canvas..."and going from there".

11 of YOUR PICTURES in the APP. for 2 MONTHs. This means 11 of your pictures will appear in the MovingPixtures App. as a subset of the defaults (non-exclusively) for a duration of at least 2 months. This means your pictures will become some of the default pictures that ship with MovingPixtures App. Pictures must agree with the apps. 4+ age rating. All rights to pictures remain with owner - copyright notice will appear in app. protecting all pictures  Each picture will also be listed on the MovingPixtures.com Website with a thumbnail and artist contact information for the same duration of time( if desired).
Original Art : "Common Tern in Shore Flight" \r\n12"x16" Acrylic on Canvas.\r\n(special price is set for Kickstarter campaign)

Original Art : "Presquille Blue Jay" 
12"x16" Acrylic on Masonite Board.
(special price is set for Kickstarter campaign)
Painted in one sitting at Presquille Provincial park.
Original Art : "Happy Little Chickadee" \r\n16"x20" Acrylic on Masonite Board.\r\n(special price is set for Kickstarter campaign)

1 Month Logo Sponsorship/Ad at startup of App.
Your company Logo ( or personal name) would appear on the startup screen of the app. Basically the "Ship" or the "Bear" pictures, would flip and reveal your logo and sponsorship acknowledgment for 2 seconds. Pledger requests a month on a first come first serve basis, determined by the date/time of an e-mail request, which must be made by the backer as soon after pledging as possible. (TIMING MATTERS!)
Send e-mail to any Movingpixtures related e-mail address.
(1 month x 2 spots x 12 months = 48 available)

16"x20" Acrylic on Canvas.
(Includes Frame - Professionally Framed)
(special price is set for Kickstarter campaign)
